name: Getting into IT by Pete Roome (@zoltarSpeaks)
tagline: A talk for Nottingham Trent University by Pete Roome (@zoltarSpeaks)
body:
### Getting into IT by Pete Roome (@zoltarSpeaks)
These are the slides that accompanied the talk i gave at Nottingham Trent University to students interested in getting into IT, on 14/04/15. The slides don't make much sense on their own with the context of the talk too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
